Alternate Title: Why peace can only be based on the law of victory
Creator: Sorbets, Gaston, 1874-1955, artist
Description: Poster text in French tells why the peace should not be based on the word of the Germans. Illustrations consist of nine small photographs of scenes of the war.
Physical Collection: Texas War Records War Poster collection

Subject: World War, 1914-1918; World War, 1914-1918--Propaganda; Posters; Lithographs; World War, 1914-1918--Art and the war; World War, 1914-1918--France
Title: Pourquoi la paix ne peut être basée que sur la victoire du droit
